ViewObject.Name: BoqBudgetLinesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BUDGET_LINE_ID, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.COST_CODE, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.CUMMULATIVE_BUDGET_AMOUNT, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.CURRENT_BUDGET_AMOUNT, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PREVIOUS_BOQ_HEADER_ID, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PREVIOUS_BUDGET_AMOUNT, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.RBS_ELEMENT_ID, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.TASK_ID, (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID) AS PROJECT_NUMBER, (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.task_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS TASK_NUMBER, (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.task_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.TASK_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select sum(blt.previous_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select sum(blt.cummulative_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, (select sum(blt.current_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID) AS VIEW_ATTR, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BUDGET_QTY, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PREVIOUS_BUDGET_QTY, XxboqBudgetLinesEO.CURRENT_BUDGET_QTY

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProjectNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pj.project_number from xxpj_projects_t pj where pj.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_number from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.task_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaskName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select pt.task_name from xxpj_project_tasks_t pt where pt.project_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.PROJECT_ID and pt.task_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.TASK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalPreviousBudgetAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(blt.previous_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalCumulativeBudgetAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(blt.cummulative_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalCurrentBudgetAmount
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sum(blt.current_budget_amount) from xxboq_budget_lines_t blt where blt.boq_header_id = XxboqBudgetLinesEO.BOQ_HEADER_ID)
